name: Simplify
headline: Helping a billion people build their dream career
description:
Simplify is building the AI-enabled infrastructure to power the next generation of hiring ‚Äì reimagining how people discover and secure their next career opportunity. We believe that everyone deserves an all-star talent agent helping them plan, manage, and accomplish their career goals, no matter their background, location, or education.

Through our flagship product, Copilot, we've helped over 1M+ job seekers discover and apply to over 100 million jobs - and we've done this with a tight-knit team of just 7 people. We're rapidly expanding on both the candidate and recruiter fronts, focused on our vision of building a common app and personal AI agent for your career.

Backed by top-tier investors including Craft and YCombinator, we're a mission-driven team working to democratize the job search and disrupt the way hiring works today.

founders.name: Ethan Horoschak, Founder
founders.description: Stanford CS. Passionate about automation, XR, and blockchain!

We're here for 
every step of your search.
## Tell us about your career history and goals. We'll help you craft a standout profile and help you land your dream job.
üîçJob Matches
### Get matched to relevant jobs, personalized to you
Forget endlessly scrolling on job boards. Tell us your preferences & dealbreakers and we'll match you with jobs that fit.
[Get Matched Now](https://simplify.jobs/</preferences?from=landing>)
‚ö°Ô∏èAutofill Applications
### Autofill repetitive job application questions
Install the Simplify Copilot extension to autofill your job applications & see keywords missing in your resume.
[Add to Chrome](https://simplify.jobs/<https:/simplify.jobs/install?from=landing>)[Learn More](https://simplify.jobs/</copilot?from=landing>)
30,000,000+ applications submitted
üìùAI Resume Builder
### Craft the perfect tailored resume for every job
Use AI to tailor your resume to fit the job description, see your resume ATS score, and identify missing keywords, all in a few clicks.
[Get a Free Resume](https://simplify.jobs/</resume-builder>)
üíºJob Tracker
### Bookmark jobs and track your search
Goodbye spreadsheets. Bookmark job postings from 50+ job boards and manage your applications within our job tracker.
[Track Your Applications](https://simplify.jobs/</job-application-tracker>)
![Job Tracker](https://simplify.jobs/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Flanding%2Fhero%2Fjob_tracker.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Join over **500,000** candidates that hear back **25% more** with Simplify than on other platforms üéâ

### Resume ATS Score
See what's wrong with your resume and how to fix it

Track all your career achievements and get promoted faster

We help you find the hiring manager and send a personalized email

Got questions?
## Explore our FAQ section to learn more.
üí¨
### Is Simplify free? How do you make money?
We dropped out of college and started Simplify to equip job seekers with the tools they need to put their best foot forward in the job search. The base version of Simplify and Simplify Copilot ‚Äì including unlimited job tracking and autofill ‚Äì is and will be free forever. We make money by charging companies to post jobs and promote their openings ‚Äì we don't sell your data. We also have a premium subscription called Simplify+ that offers an additional suite of AI features to help you supercharge your job search.
üí¨
### How does Simplify work?
Think of Simplify like a personal Hollywood-agent for your career. When you create a profile, you'll tell us the skills you have, the types jobs youre looking for, and any dealbreakers (minimum salary, location, etc.). Our AI will match you with specific opportunities that fit you from the millions of opportunities in our database. When you apply, we'll help you autofill your application and show you the most important keywords that are missing from your resume. We have an AI resume builder that lets you tailor your resume in seconds. Finally, our tracker helps you stay organized across all the jobs you've applied to. Ready to see Simplify in action? Click the teal ‚ÄúSign-Up‚Äù button to get started!
üí¨
### How does Simplify handle my data?
We're internet users too and place a heavy emphasis and commitment to your privacy. First and foremost, we do not sell your data. The data you share with us is used to help match you with relevant jobs and autofill your applications. Simplify also operates as a hiring marketplace, meaning recruiters often use Simplify to post exclusive opportunities and find perfect-fit candidates (like you!). None of your data is shared with anyone off-platform without your consent ‚Äì that's a promise!
üí¨
### How does Simplify get the job postings it recommends me?
The majority of the job openings you'll find on Simplify are taken directly from each company's native job board. Our system regularly checks the career pages of the 20,000+ companies on Simplify for new openings to recommend you. Each of the companies on our platform are vetted to ensure that every job you see is legit and up to date. We also work with a number of employers who exclusively post their roles on Simplify ‚Äì so you'll see opportunities here you won't find anywhere else on the web!

## Explore our FAQ section to learn more.
üí¨
### Is Simplify free? How do you make money?
We dropped out of college and started Simplify to equip job seekers with the tools they need to put their best foot forward in the job search. The base version of Simplify and Simplify Copilot ‚Äì including unlimited job tracking and autofill ‚Äì is and will be free forever. We make money by charging companies to post jobs and promote their openings ‚Äì we don't sell your data. We also have a premium subscription called Simplify+ that offers an additional suite of AI features to help you supercharge your job search.
üí¨
### How does Simplify work?
Think of Simplify like a personal Hollywood-agent for your career. When you create a profile, you'll tell us the skills you have, the types jobs youre looking for, and any dealbreakers (minimum salary, location, etc.). Our AI will match you with specific opportunities that fit you from the millions of opportunities in our database. When you apply, we'll help you autofill your application and show you the most important keywords that are missing from your resume. We have an AI resume builder that lets you tailor your resume in seconds. Finally, our tracker helps you stay organized across all the jobs you've applied to. Ready to see Simplify in action? Click the teal ‚ÄúSign-Up‚Äù button to get started!
üí¨
### How does Simplify handle my data?
We're internet users too and place a heavy emphasis and commitment to your privacy. First and foremost, we do not sell your data. The data you share with us is used to help match you with relevant jobs and autofill your applications. Simplify also operates as a hiring marketplace, meaning recruiters often use Simplify to post exclusive opportunities and find perfect-fit candidates (like you!). None of your data is shared with anyone off-platform without your consent ‚Äì that's a promise!
üí¨
### How does Simplify get the job postings it recommends me?
The majority of the job openings you'll find on Simplify are taken directly from each company's native job board. Our system regularly checks the career pages of the 20,000+ companies on Simplify for new openings to recommend you. Each of the companies on our platform are vetted to ensure that every job you see is legit and up to date. We also work with a number of employers who exclusively post their roles on Simplify ‚Äì so you'll see opportunities here you won't find anywhere else on the web!

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Simplify**

Founded in 2020, Simplify is on a mission to revolutionize how people navigate their careers, aspiring to help a billion individuals achieve their dream jobs. Starting life with a small yet dedicated team of just seven, the company has made significant strides, assisting over one million job seekers to apply for more than 100 million job positions. That's no small feat.

**What They Do**

At the core of Simplify‚Äôs offerings is their flagship product, *Copilot*, which acts like a personal assistant for your career. It provides tailored job recommendations, assists in crafting optimized resumes, and tracks applications‚Äîall while striving to simplify the often overwhelming job search process. Unlike traditional job boards, Simplify matches users with relevant job opportunities based on their profile, skills, and preferences, which improves the chances of receiving feedback by 25% compared to other platforms.

Their tools include:
- **Job Matches:** Personalized job recommendations to fit your skills and preferences.
- **Autofill Applications:** A browser extension that saves time by autofilling repetitive application fields.
- **AI Resume Builder:** Create tailored resumes quickly and easily.
- **Job Tracker:** Organize and track all your job applications in one place.

In essence, Simplify operates like a Hollywood agent for your career, aiming to democratize the hiring process through cutting-edge technology, all while maintaining user privacy.

**Backed by Giants**

The company is supported by prominent investors, including Craft Ventures and Y Combinator, and considers itself part of a movement to disrupt standard hiring practices. Its base model is free for users, as they charge companies for job postings, ensuring that users‚Äô data remains confidential and is not sold.

**Location and Leadership**

Based in San Francisco, Simplify is not just another tech startup. With a close-knit team of five, they maintain a lean operational structure that allows for agility and speed in the ever-changing job market. Harj Taggar, a partner at the group, lends his expertise to guide their growth.

**The Future: Expanding Horizons**

Looking ahead, Simplify is geared towards building a comprehensive career platform, deploying its technology to enhance both the job seeker experience and support recruiters. As they scale, their vision is to create a personal AI agent that operates like a career consultant, accessible regardless of users‚Äô backgrounds or locations.

In a world that's complicated enough, Simplify makes the career journey clearer and more accessible‚Äîtruly, a tool for this generation of job seekers. If you're curious about simplifying your job search, you might want to check them out at [Simplify Jobs](https://simplify.jobs/).
